examples.example: 在那充满活力的课堂上，同学们积极发言，氛围十分热烈。

translate.english: In that vibrant classroom, students actively speak up and the atmosphere is very lively.

examples.example: 有趣的课堂总是能让同学们全神贯注地投入学习。

translate.english: Interesting classes can always make students devote themselves to learning with full attention.

examples.example: 精彩的课堂让同学们沉浸其中，享受着知识带来的乐趣。

translate.english: Wonderful classes make students immersed in them and enjoy the fun brought by knowledge.
